citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:51pm on
February 23, 2022.
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating they were out of town.
End Section
